Key Match Events: The Chicago Bulls won the game 125-123 to improve to 2-2 in their first four preseason games.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball reacted to his brother's return with a post that had over 15,000 likes and 400,000 impressions in three hours.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lonzo Ball made his return to an NBA floor after 2 years.
Lonzo Ball had signed with the Bulls during the summer of 2021 and had averaged 13.0 points, 5.4 rebounds, 5.1 assists and 1.8 steals per contest before getting injured.
Others: The Bulls will play their first game of the 2024-25 regular season on October 23 when they visit Dejounte Murray and the New Orleans Pelicans.
